value:
$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You! Golden Seer!$k$p...Gullveig!$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You've taken many lives, and have
given us no time to grieve.$k$pThe blood you've spilled cannot
be undone, and we cannot return
those you've taken from us to life...$k$pBut despite it all...as long as survivors
remain, the future is not lost! We can
still create a new future for ourselves.$k$pWe will defeat you here and build
the future we wish to see!$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|Future? What future? What you
call the future is born from the
flow of time.$k$pTime's flow bends to my command.
And I say you have no future.$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Yes! We finally defeated her!$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_12,0|$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|...No. You have not.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|But we—$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|I reversed the time my body
experienced and returned to the
past, my injuries undone.$k$pAnd now...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Whaa—$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|You have been undone.$k$pReturned now to a time before
your birth—to a time when you
were nothing at all.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Commander Anna... She's...gone?!$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Sharena! Run! Get out of here!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cry|Alfonse, I—$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Damn you, Gullveig!$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|As I said, you have no future.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I...I don't know what to do.
How can we hope to fight this?$k$p$EFace_Cry|It's up to...you,
$Nu...$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|...$k$pAlfonse, Sharena, Anna... All your
allies are gone.$k$pAnd now, you are all that remains.$k$pTime is cruel, isn't it?$k$pGood-bye, $Nu.$k$p$Sbs5000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|...Midgard! Child of Midgard!
Can you hear me? Follow the
sound of my voice.$k$pI have given to you a vision of the
future. Remember it well.$k$pYou will need this revelation if you
are to save the future.$k$pAs long as you hold on to your hope,
its light will not fade; it will remain,
living on in your heart...$k$p$Sbs3000|$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|
